Return Data.batch_configuration: Processing 2500 records per batch across 8 parallel threads. Incremental migration will track changes using timestamp-based checkpoints. Memory allocation: 256MB per thread for optimal performance.
Return Data.estimated_duration: Approximately 2.5 hours for full migration completion, assuming 750K customer records, 2.1M orders, and 4.8M order items. Incremental updates will process in 15-30 minute intervals.
Return Data.rollback_strategy: Point-in-time recovery enabled with automated snapshot creation before each batch. Rollback procedures include: 1) Stop migration process, 2) Restore from pre-migration snapshot, 3) Verify data integrity, 4) Resume normal operations. Expected rollback time: 45 minutes.
Return Data.resource_requirements: CPU: 8 cores minimum, Memory: 4GB RAM, Storage: 50GB temporary space for staging, Network: 1Gbps bandwidth recommended. Database connections: 16 concurrent connections (8 read + 8 write).
